definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
with no regard for law or discipline (idiom); flouting the law and disregarding all rules/in complete disorder
lit. like a monk holding an umbrella — no hair, no sky (idiom) (punning on 髮|发[fa4] vs 法[fa3])/fig. defying the law and the principles of heaven/lawless
pinyin: he2 shang5 da3 san3 , wu2 fa3 wu2 tian1

sentences.english: They said the targe was out of reach.
sentences.chinese: 他們抱怨說這個目標無法達成。

sentences.english: She was too slight to play basketball.
sentences.chinese: 她太纖弱了，無法打籃球。

sentences.english: We are now in no way to make any further concession in price.
sentences.chinese: 我們應經無法再在價格方面做出讓步了。

sentences.english: But Baldwin admits his officers can't catch everything using scanners.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾溫承認工作人員無法用掃描儀監控所有物品。

sentences.english: Because we cannot feel the sweet without comparison.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們無法感覺到甜而不比較。

sentences.english: I cannot overemphasize the psychological trauma to these people.
sentences.chinese: 我無法更加強強調他們所受的心理創傷。

sentences.english: Destructors or finalizers cannot be explicitly overridden.
sentences.chinese: 無法顯式重寫析構函數或終結器。

sentences.english: But I am unable to relate the thrill and secrecy that subtle instant holds for me.
sentences.chinese: 但我無法描述那微妙的瞬間頃刻產生的震撼和神祕。

sentences.english: The downside is that you won't get a formal diagnosis nor prescription.
sentences.chinese: 不足之處是你無法得到正式的診斷書及處方。

sentences.english: International business English teaching quality hearing can not be guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 國際商務英語聽力教學質量無法保證。

sentences.english: Had Jesus not died on the cross, Christianity would not have triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌要是不死在十字架上，基督教就無法取得勝利。

sentences.english: But the Separatists discovered that the Speedwell leaked and therefore could not make the journey.
sentences.chinese: 可是分離派發現斯碧薇爾號漏水了，所以無法航行。

sentences.english: They are able to cut through metal and are nearly impossible to destroy.
sentences.chinese: 它們可以切割金屬，也幾乎無法摧毀。

sentences.english: There is no solution to the question of climate change without forestry.
sentences.chinese: 如果不關注森林，那麼氣候變化問題就是無法解決的。

sentences.english: Local rulers were too weak to extirpate them.
sentences.chinese: 當地的統治者力量太弱，無法根除他們。

definition: there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to be capable of/to be able to/can
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
